title: Night Moves
description: "A lot of people who find something like that a stone's throw from their house would just pull up stakes and take off."Some people had skeletons in their closets; Maggie Fitzgerald had one in her yard. She's retreated from her fast-paced life, seeking peace and solitude in the country. So she's horrified when landscaper Cliff Delaney uncovers human bones buried deep beneath her perfectly tended garden.The discovery shatters Maggie's peace entirely. A cold-blooded killer is still on the loose, putting Maggie's life in terrible dangerâ€”and her rural idyll is rapidly becoming a nightmare.
author: Nora Roberts
